expo.name: recipe-dex
expo.description: A digital recipe storage solution. Add your own recipes manually, or download them from the in-app browser and save them to your phone. Currently known to work on these recipe sites: allrecipes.com, foodnetwork.com, tasty.co, food.com, yummly.com, thepioneerwoman.com, epicurious.com, bettycrocker.com, eatingwell.com, and delish.com
